name: Namecodes
description:
Do you enjoy games? How about names? How about codes?

Good news. Namecodes is for you.

Namecodes is a fun Figma-based game modeled on the popular game Codenames! I mean...let's be real—this is just a way to play Codenames while we're trapped in our houses. That's the deal.

Hopefully you own this game in real life. If you don't, you should grab a copy—it's fun!
